["Commodity type: Matte long straight hair wig Style: Women's long straight wig Wig type: Headband wig Color: Black gradient light brown on the top of the head Material: Heat-resistant synthetic fiber. ProductPackage: 1 wig + 1 free hair cap + 1 free hair band Version: V2 (add 4 comb inside to increase safety) How to wear a wig: 1. Wrap your hair tightly in the wig cap we prepared for you. 2. Push in all the hair on the sides, back and front to create a smooth surface. 3. Gently comb the wig and pull the adjustable strap to fit your head size. 4. Hold the top and bottom of the wig, pull it out from the front of the head, and then gently pull it back to adjust the wig to cover the hat and fit the head perfectly How to clean a wig: 1. Using mild shampoo, gently soak the wig in cold or warm water. 2. Rinse the hair in the same direction with warm water. 3. Gently comb your hair from top to bottom. 4. Tile the wig and let it dry naturally. How to care for a wig: 1. Do not spray gel water and wax on the wig to avoid greasy wigs. 2. Do not use hair clips to avoid damage to the net. 3. Do not curl hair that exceeds 400 degrees Fahrenheit (about 100.2 degrees Celsius). Comb your hair patiently. 4. After finishing use, put it back in the box or dust-proof. Q A 1. Why does hair fall out? After the new product is produced, some floating hair will appear on it. When wearing it for the first time, please comb and remove the floating hair. 2. About tangles: Hair will be tangled due to dryness, grease and dirt accumulation. And all synthetic wigs are a little tangled, which is normal.For long-term use, please make sure to wash and care for it at least once a week. If you have any questions, please feel free to email us."]

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

The user maintains a strong focus on hair care products tailored for curly, coily, and damaged hair. They have been exploring options like synthetic braiding extensions and wigs while seeking lighter, more manageable styles due to frustrations with previous purchases. Their latest successful acquisition of crochet hair extensions highlights their commitment to quality and an appreciation for aesthetically pleasing options that also meet comfort and functionality standards.

Recent interactions indicate the user is actively refining their choices within the hair care landscape, showcasing a willingness to reassess brand loyalty. The user is particularly drawn to products that offer a natural look and versatility. Their recent purchase of crochet hair with a favorable curl pattern further emphasizes their discerning nature when evaluating hair accessories. 

This ongoing journey reflects their dedication to curating a diverse yet cohesive array of hair care solutions that align with their unique preferences. As their collection evolves, they continue to prioritize high-quality items that harmonize health and style, maintaining a thoughtful balance in their hair care routine. The user remains open to exploring new styles while ensuring that each addition complements their aesthetic vision without sacrificing comfort.
